item.description:
New start time: 11AM.  They have another private function in the afternoon, so we must leave by 1:15 so they can do the turnover!!

A newer tea room with great food and nice ambiance. Depending on the weather, we could go for a walk or a little shopping nearby in Rockport after lunch... Check out their location and menu at their website.

They are officially closed for the season, but creating a private luncheon just for us!

$15 (plus tax, gratuity) for:

- Tea or coffee - Small side salad - Choice of Quiche (spinach, ham & Gruyere cheese)
  OR 3 Tea Sandwiches (cucumber, chicken salad & tuna) - 2 tea treats (choice of cookies, lemon square, etc.)

Any donations for meetup group maintenance gratefully accepted at this and and every event.

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Luncheon at Heath's Tea Room Rockport
